content.question: Based on the reaction and data table shown, what is the value of <math alttext="delta H naught sub f" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msubsup><mi>H</mi><mi>f</mi><mo>∘</mo></msubsup></math> of <math alttext="C 2 H 5 O H, liquid" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mtext>C</mtext> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <msub> <mtext>H</mtext> <mn>5</mn> </msub> <mtext>OH</mtext> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>l</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </math>?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
